title: Manage user groups for OO Workflow Designer
content:
Role Location
System Administrator IdM Administration Console of OO Workflow Designer

To manage groups, go to OO Workflow Designer APPLICATION > IdM Administration Console, click the organization name, then click on the Groups tab. This page displays the group name and the related roles.

Create a new user group

Creating user groups helps you to manage what roles and permissions that you want to assign to the users.

To create a new group:

  1. Click  on the menu to add a group.
  2. in the Group Settings area, enter the user name, and display name, and choose an appropriate role from the Associated Roles drop-down list box.
  3. In the Users area, click the Associated Users drop-down and select an appropriate user from the existing user list.

    You can also type into a dynamic search field to filter the user results.

  4. Click SAVE. 

Edit an existing group

To edit an existing group:

  1. Choose a group, then click   to edit an existing group.
  2. You can change the Display Name of the group, Associated Roles, and Associated Users.
  3. Click SAVE to apply the changes.

Delete an existing group

  1. Choose a group you want to remove.
  2. Click delete  .
  3. Click REMOVE to remove the group.

Map a user to a role using the group

To map a user to a specific group:

  1. Choose a group, then click   to edit an existing group.
  2. In the Users area, click the Associated Users drop-down list. The list of existing roles displays.
  3. Select an appropriate role and click SAVE. The user is mapped to a role.

Related topics

  • For instructions to manage OO Workflow Designer users in IdM Administration Console, see Manage OO Workflow Designer users.
